snippet: South Korea's Samsung Electronics Co Ltd has applied for a license to invest $3 billion in building a second smartphone factory in northern Vietnam, a government official said on Monday....

headline.print_headline: Samsung Electronics to Build $3 Billion Smartphone Plant in Vietnam
headline.main: Samsung Electronics to Build $3 Billion Smartphone Plant in Vietnam

lead_paragraph: South Korea's Samsung Electronics Co Ltd has applied for a license to invest $3 billion in building a second smartphone factory in northern Vietnam, a government official said on Monday.
